content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-14.5, -48.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) extracting iron ore.
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5) storing extracted iron ore.
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -46.5) transferring items between entities.
- Iron Chest at position (-14.5, -47.5) for intermediate storage.
- Additional Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -45.5) for item transfer.

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0) extracting coal.
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Iron Chest at position (41.5, -80.5) storing coal.
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5) for transferring items into the furnace.
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -79.5) for additional storage.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors due to Lack of Ingredients
- Ensure that the required ingredients are available in the inventory before attempting to insert them into a furnace or any other entity.

### Inserter Waiting for Source Items
- Verify that the source items are available for inserters to pick up. If inserters are waiting, check the supply chain to ensure items are being produced and transported correctly.

### Errors when Chest is Full
- Regularly check and empty chests to prevent mining drills from stopping due to full storage. This ensures continuous production and resource gathering.
